item.description:
Dance to Ballroom, Latin, Swing & Hustle. All-levels FOXTROT Lesson, Dance, Cash Bar & Refreshments, Proper Dress - UPPER Lev.

6:00 Special treat - those competing at "The Commonwealth Classic" will perform in a Dress Rehearsal.
7:15 Foxtrot Class. Learn the Basics plus something for experience dancers.
8:00 Dance to Ballroom, Latin, Swing and Hustle.

See you there!

ABL has a cover charge - see the main page for details.

One of the cool things about the ABL dances is that many of the studios teachers are at the dance and dance with many of us mortals.

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: BALLROOM Dance Lounge & Dress Rehearsal
